title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a user can successfully register using valid credentials and required information.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page.
Fill out the registration form with valid username, email, and password.
Submit the registration form.
Confirm the registration is successful and user is redirected to the login page or dashboard.

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Validate that users can log in successfully using valid username/email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify successful login and access to the user dashboard.

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure login fails with incorrect username/email or password and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click login button.
Confirm login fails and an error message is displayed.

title: JWT Token Refresh Flow
description: Test that users can refresh their JWT tokens without needing to re-authenticate when tokens expire.

steps.description: Log in successfully and obtain JWT token.
Wait for the token to expire or simulate expiration.
Send token refresh request using the refresh token.
Verify a new JWT token is returned and user session remains active.

title: OAuth Login Integration
description: Verify that users can log in using integrated OAuth providers correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Choose an OAuth provider (e.g., Google).
Complete OAuth login flow.
Verify successful login and access to user dashboard.

title: Business Profile CRUD Operations
description: Ensure users can create, read, update, and delete business profiles while maintaining compliance context tracking.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to business profile management.
Create a new business profile with valid data.
Confirm the new profile is saved and visible in the list.
Open the created profile and update fields.
Verify changes are saved correctly.
Delete the business profile.
Confirm the profile is removed and no residual data remains.

title: Dynamic Compliance Assessment Workflow
description: Test multi-framework selection and dynamic, adaptive workflows for compliance assessments including GDPR and ISO 27001.

steps.description: Log in and initiate a compliance assessment selecting GDPR and ISO 27001 frameworks.
Verify that the workflow displays relevant questions dynamically based on selections.
Answer assessment questions and proceed through the workflow.
Ensure correct conditional questions appear and completion status is updated.

title: AI-Driven Question Help and Follow-ups
description: Validate AI services provide contextual help on assessment questions and generate appropriate follow-up questions.

steps.description: During assessment, request help on a given question.
Confirm AI provides contextual help response relevant to the question.
Answer a question triggering AI-generated follow-up questions.
Verify follow-up questions appear appropriately in the workflow.

title: Evidence Document Upload and AI Validation
description: Test file uploads with support for multiple document types and AI-driven classification and validation of evidence.

steps.description: During assessment, upload evidence files including PDF, DOCX, JPEG.
Confirm files upload successfully without errors.
Trigger AI classification and validation of uploaded evidence.
Verify AI correctly classifies documents and flags validation issues if present.

title: AI Assessment Rate Limiting
description: Verify that AI assessment endpoints enforce rate limits to prevent abuse and ensure stability.

steps.description: Send a high volume of AI assessment requests exceeding rate limits.
Confirm that rate limiting responses are received with appropriate HTTP status codes.

title: Dashboard Navigation and Rendering
description: Ensure the dashboard and all authenticated routes render correctly without hydration errors and that navigation works as expected.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the main dashboard.
Check that the dashboard UI renders without errors or layout shifts.
Navigate between dashboard components like business profiles and AI policy pages.
Verify seamless navigation and correct content rendering on each page.

title: Database Migration Integrity
description: Test database migrations to fix column naming issues and ensure no data loss or corruption occurs.

steps.description: Run database migration scripts in a test environment with existing data.
Verify that column renames are applied correctly and data remains intact.

title: Input Validation and Injection Prevention
description: Validate input fields enforce strict whitelist validation and prevent injection attacks.

steps.description: Attempt to input malicious payloads (e.g., SQL, XSS) in all user inputs including forms and API endpoints.
Confirm that all inputs are properly sanitized and rejected, with error messages indicating invalid input.

title: API Response Performance Benchmarks
description: Ensure API responses have a 95th percentile latency under 200ms and database queries under 50ms.

steps.description: Execute representative API requests under load testing conditions.
Verify API response times meet the sub-200ms 95th percentile requirement.
Monitor underlying database query execution times during API calls.
Ensure query response times stay below 50ms.

title: Security Compliance Audit Logging
description: Check that all critical user actions and system events are logged to satisfy GDPR, ISO 27001, Cyber Essentials, and SOC 2 standards.

steps.description: Perform sensitive operations such as login, logout, profile update, and evidence upload.
Verify audit logs capture detailed information including timestamp, user identity, and action performed.

title: AI Model Circuit Breaker Resilience
description: Simulate AI model failures and verify the system gracefully switches between available models without impacting user experience.

steps.description: Simulate failure or timeout in primary AI model.
Confirm the system activates circuit breaker and switches to an alternate AI model.
Continue AI assessment requests.
Validate consistent AI responses without service interruption.

title: Real-time AI Chat WebSocket Communication
description: Test the WebSocket based real-time AI chat features including connection establishment, message streaming, and error handling.

steps.description: Connect to AI chat server via WebSocket.
Verify connection is established successfully.
Send chat messages and receive streaming AI responses in real time.
Confirm responses stream correctly without delays or interruption.
Simulate network interruption.
Verify client handles disconnections gracefully and attempts reconnection if applicable.

title: Security Headers and Rate Limiting Verification
description: Validate HTTP security headers are present and rate limiting is enforced correctly to protect against abuse.

steps.description: Send HTTP requests and inspect response headers.
Confirm security headers like Content-Security-Policy, Strict-Transport-Security, X-Content-Type-Options are set.
Send rapid requests exceeding rate limits.
Ensure rate limiting responses are triggered with suitable HTTP status codes.

title: Frontend Hydration and State Management Stability
description: Test that pages built with Next.js and React hydrate correctly without warnings and that state management via Zustand and TanStack Query functions as expected.

steps.description: Load key pages in authenticated routes.
Check browser console to verify that no hydration errors or warnings appear.
Perform state changes through the UI and verify that data updates correctly.
Confirm UI reflects state changes and data fetching operates smoothly.

title: Monitoring Dashboards Data Accuracy and Alerts
description: Verify that system monitoring dashboards display accurate system health metrics, database performance, AI cost tracking, and security events with real-time updates and alerts.

steps.description: Access monitoring dashboards as an administrator.
Confirm displayed metrics match actual system and AI usage statistics.
Trigger monitored events such as security alerts and system health warnings.
Verify the dashboards reflect these events with timely notifications.
